dcterms:creator: Maria Madsen
Shirley Gregor
dcterms:description: The Human-Computer Trust (HCT) questionnaire assesses the trust relationship between humans and machines, measuring five dimensions: Perceived Understandability, Perceived Reliability, Perceived Technical Competence, Personal Attachment, and Faith.
dcterms:title: Human-Computer Trust (HCT) questionnaire

dcterms:creator: Marc Hassenzahl
Michael Burmester
Franz Koller
dcterms:description: The AttrakDiff questionnaire extends the assessment of a DS or software in general, measuring pragmatic quality, hedonic qualities of stimulation and identity, and attractiveness.
dcterms:title: AttrakDiff questionnaire
